content.prompt: Which of the following is an implication of the data for Mexico?

choices.label: Organized crime and drug violence have fueled corruption in Mexico.
President Nieto has been very successful in reducing corruption in Mexico.
The government has been more successful at reducing corruption in the north than in the south.
Citizen protests led to a large decrease in governmental corruption in Mexico.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
